Class ReversiApp

java.lang.Object
ReversiApp
public class ReversiApp
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing an instance of the Reversi application
Version:
1.0
Author:
Kai Uerlichs

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method creating an instance of the Reversi application and launching it
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments (not applicable)

    • run

      public void run()
      Launches the main menu and keeps displaying it until the game is quit

    • mainMenu

      public void mainMenu()
      Displays the main menu

    • processMainMenu

      public void processMainMenu()
      When called, takes a user input for main menu selection and processes the users choice

    • newGameMenu

      public void newGameMenu()
      Shows a number of menu screens in order to set up a new game of Reversi

    • runGame

      public void runGame​(int playerCount, int gamemode, java.lang.String player1, java.lang.String player2, int colours, int startingPlayer, int hints)
      Set up a new game of Reversi and run it
      Parameters:
      playerCount - Defines the player count of the game: Singleplayer (1) or Multiplayer (2)
      gamemode - Defines the gamemode of the game: Othello (1) or Traditional (2)
      player1 - Defines the first players name
      player2 - Defines the second players name, if applicable
      colours - Defines the colour set
      startingPlayer - Defines which player starts the game
      hints - Defines the hints settings

    • runGame

      public void runGame​(Game game)
      Runs a game of Reversi
      Parameters:
      game - The game instance to be run

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame​(Game game)
      Save a game of Reversi
      Parameters:
      game - The game to be saved

      Load a saved game and run it
